titles.title: To amend the General Education Provisions Act to allow State and county prosecutors access to student records in certain cases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 2/4/1997--Introduced. Amends the General Education Provisions Act to declare that nothing in such Act shall be construed to require State and county prosecutors to obtain a court order to receive student information, before or after adjudication, if the information sought pertains to a criminal investigation or prosecution of the student.
